players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Charlie, why are you calling yourself suspicious? That seems like an odd thing to say."
Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and confirmed it."
Charlie: "I killed Diana last night. Be careful, Charlie might be the mafioso."
You: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of Diana? That doesn't make sense for Night 1."
Bob: "I investigated Charlie because I suspected him, not Diana. Now we know he's mafia. Vote Charlie with me."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob

players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Alice: "Charlie, why are you calling yourself suspicious? That seems like an odd thing to say."
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and confirmed it."
Charlie: "I killed Diana last night. Be careful, Charlie might be the mafioso."
Alice: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of Diana? That doesn't make sense for Night 1."
You: "I investigated Charlie because I suspected him, not Diana. Now we know he's mafia. Vote Charlie with me."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
